sentences.en: Guilt can be very destructive.
sentences.cn: 负疚感会具有很强的杀伤力。

sentences.en: He did not deny his guilt.
sentences.cn: 他没有否认自己有罪。

sentences.en: He felt an enormous sense of guilt when he thought about how he’d treated her.
sentences.cn: 他想到自己那样对待她，心里非常歉疚。

sentences.en: He had a chance to confess and expiate his guilt.
sentences.cn: 他有认错和赎罪的机会。

sentences.en: He used to buy them expensive presents, out of guilt.
sentences.cn: 出于内疚，他以前总是给他们买昂贵的礼物。

sentences.en: His creative drive has been strangled by his sense of political guilt.
sentences.cn: 他的创造欲望已被他的政治负罪感扼杀了。

sentences.en: His guilt was proved beyond all doubt by the prosecution.
sentences.cn: 他的罪行已被原告方证实确凿无疑。

sentences.en: I was racked with guilt at my part in making her this unhappy.
sentences.cn: 她这么不开心也有我的原因，我为此深感内疚。

sentences.en: I would have twinges of guilt occasionally.
sentences.cn: 我时而会感到阵阵内疚。

sentences.en: She had feelings of guilt about leaving her children and going to work.
sentences.cn: 她因离开自己的孩子去工作而感到内疚。

sentences.en: She lives with a pervasive sense of guilt.
sentences.cn: 她生活在深深的愧疚之中。

sentences.en: She was guilt-ridden at the way she had treated him.
sentences.cn: 她为过去那样对待他而深感内疚。

sentences.en: She was overwhelmed by feelings of guilt.
sentences.cn: 她感到愧疚难当。

sentences.en: Sometimes I felt little pangs of guilt .
sentences.cn: 有时候我也会有一点点的内疚。

sentences.en: The associative guilt was ingrained in his soul.
sentences.cn: 由此产生的内疚感在他灵魂深处挥之不去。

sentences.en: The drinking and the guilt fed on each other.
sentences.cn: 酗酒和犯罪彼此助长。

sentences.en: The weight of irrational guilt pressed on her.
sentences.cn: 无端的负罪感压得她喘不过气来。

sentences.en: They feel shame and guilt as though it is their fault.
sentences.cn: 他们觉得羞愧和内疚，就好像这是他们的错。

sentences.en: They may be burdened by guilt and regret.
sentences.cn: 他们内心可能充满内疚和悔恨。

sentences.en: We're so laden with guilt.
sentences.cn: 我们深感愧疚。

sentences.en: You weren't convinced of Mr Matthews' guilt.
sentences.cn: 你不相信马修斯先生有罪。

words.tran_cn: 无罪的，无辜的；没有…的，不知…的

trans.tran_cn: 有罪，犯罪行为，罪恶，[法律] 轻罪，过失，内疚，知罪，自责
trans.tran_en: the fact that you have broken an official law or moral rule
